verses.verse: <S%H120>"Man,<s%> who is <S%H3205>born<s%> of a <S%H802>woman,<s%> is of <S%H7116>few<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> and <S%H7649>full<s%> of <S%H7267>trouble.<s%>
He comes <S%H3318>forth<s%> like a <S%H6731>flower,<s%> and is cut <S%H5243>down.<s%> He also <S%H1272>flees<s%> like a <S%H6738>shadow,<s%> and <S%H5975>doesn't<s%> continue.
Do you <S%H6491>open<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> on such a <S%H2088>one,<s%> and <S%H935>bring<s%> me into judgment with <S%H4941>you?<s%>
Who can <S%H5414>bring<s%> a <S%H2889>clean<s%> thing out of an <S%H2931>unclean?<s%> Not <S%H259>one.<s%>

<S%H518>Seeing<s%> his <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H2782>determined,<s%> the <S%H4557>number<s%> of his <S%H2320>months<s%> is with <S%H6213>you,<s%> and you have appointed his <S%H2706>bounds<s%> that he <S%H5674>can't<s%> pass;
<S%H8159>Look<s%> away from <S%H2308>him,<s%> that he may rest, until he shall <S%H7521>accomplish,<s%> as a <S%H7916>hireling,<s%> his <S%H3117>day.<s%>

"For there <S%H3426>is<s%> <S%H8615>hope<s%> for a <S%H6086>tree,<s%> If it is cut <S%H3772>down,<s%> that it will sprout <S%H2498>again,<s%> that the tender <S%H3127>branch<s%> of it will not <S%H2308>cease.<s%>
Though its <S%H8328>root<s%> grows <S%H2204>old<s%> in the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and its <S%H1503>stock<s%> <S%H4191>dies<s%> in the <S%H6083>ground,<s%>
yet through the <S%H7381>scent<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> it will <S%H6524>bud,<s%> and put <S%H6213>forth<s%> <S%H7105>boughs<s%> like a <S%H5194>plant.<s%>
But <S%H1397>man<s%> <S%H4191>dies,<s%> and is laid <S%H2522>low.<s%> <S%H120>Yes,<s%> man gives up the <S%H1478>spirit,<s%> and where is he?
As the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H235>fail<s%> from the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H2717>wastes<s%> and dries <S%H3001>up,<s%>

so <S%H376>man<s%> lies <S%H7901>down<s%> and <S%H6965>doesn't<s%> rise. Until the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> are no <S%H1115>more,<s%> they shall not <S%H6974>awake,<s%> nor be roused <S%H5782>out<s%> of their <S%H8142>sleep.<s%>

"Oh <S%H5414>that<s%> you would <S%H6845>hide<s%> me in <S%H7585>Sheol,<s%> that you would keep me <S%H5641>secret,<s%> until your <S%H639>wrath<s%> is <S%H7725>past,<s%> that you would <S%H7896>appoint<s%> me a set <S%H2706>time,<s%> and remember <S%H2142>me!<s%>

If a <S%H1397>man<s%> <S%H4191>dies,<s%> shall he <S%H2421>live<s%> <S%H3117>again?<s%> All the days of my <S%H6635>warfare<s%> would I <S%H3176>wait,<s%> until my <S%H2487>release<s%> should <S%H935>come.<s%>
You would <S%H7121>call,<s%> and I would <S%H6030>answer<s%> <S%H3700>you.<s%> You would have a desire to the <S%H4639>work<s%> of your <S%H3027>hands.<s%>
But now you <S%H5608>number<s%> my <S%H6806>steps.<s%> <S%H8104>Don't<s%> you watch over my <S%H2403>sin?<s%>
My <S%H6588>disobedience<s%> is sealed <S%H2856>up<s%> in a <S%H6872>bag.<s%> You fasten <S%H2950>up<s%> my <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>
<S%H199>"But<s%> the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H5307>falling<s%> comes to <S%H5034>nothing.<s%> The <S%H6697>rock<s%> is <S%H6275>removed<s%> out of its <S%H4725>place;<s%>

The <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H7833>wear<s%> the <S%H68>stones.<s%> The torrents of it wash <S%H7857>away<s%> <S%H5599>the<s%> <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%> So you <S%H6>destroy<s%> the <S%H8615>hope<s%> of <S%H582>man.<s%>
You <S%H5331>forever<s%> <S%H8630>prevail<s%> against <S%H1980>him,<s%> and he departs. You <S%H8138>change<s%> his <S%H6440>face,<s%> and send him <S%H7971>away.<s%>
His <S%H1121>sons<s%> come to <S%H3513>honor,<s%> and he <S%H3045>doesn't<s%> know <S%H6819>it.<s%> They are brought low, but he <S%H995>doesn't<s%> perceive it of them.
But his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> on him has <S%H3510>pain,<s%> and his <S%H5315>soul<s%> inside him <S%H56>mourns.<s%>"
